about_the_game:
Cyberpunk Fighter is a third-person action game in a futuristic, cyberpunk world with super fighting genre. Be a hero and start your journey from saving your classmates in the school to saving people in the future from droids and robots. Prepare to dive into the most epic fights you’ve ever seen in this beat 'em up fighting game!

Key features:
- "Cyberpunk" style made in Unreal
- Running on walls skill
- Incredible fighting skills and scenes
- Super combo attacks
- Great fights with "big-boss"
- And more...

Cyberpunk Fighter - Start your journey and save the world!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some violence as fighting scenes

About the Game




Cyberpunk Fighter is a third-person action game in a futuristic, cyberpunk world with super fighting genre. Be a hero and start your journey from saving your classmates in the school to saving people in the future from droids and robots. Prepare to dive into the most epic fights you’ve ever seen in this beat 'em up fighting game!

Key features:

- Running on walls skill
- Incredible fighting skills and scenes
- Super combo attacks
- Great fights with "big-boss"
- And more...

Cyberpunk Fighter - Start your journey and save the world!
name: Cyberpunk Fighter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Cyberpunk Fighter is a third-person action game in a futuristic, cyberpunk world. Be a hero and start your journey from saving your classmates in the school to saving people in the future from droids and robots. Start your journey and save the world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
